title: NIELIT Notification 2025 - Walk-in interview for 02 Junior Faculty, Teaching Assistant Posts
description: The National Institute of Electronics & Information Technology, Pali (NIELIT Pali) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Junior Faculty and Teaching Assistant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ B.E./B.
